message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can you meet me there?
I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $75 and $90, so I can offer it to you for $82.50
I appreciate the compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you meet me there?
